name: Pumpkin Spice Turmeric Latte
description: Pumpkin Pie Spice Turmeric Latte. Warming comforting latte with pumpkin pie spices and turmeric. Ready in 10 minutes. Vegan Gluten-free Recipe.
recipeIngredient: 1/2 tsp or more of my pumpkin pie spice (or 1/3 tsp cinnamon, 1/4 tsp ginger, a pinch of nutmeg, optional a pinch of all spice)
1.5 cups non dairy milk (I like almond milk)
1.5 tbsp or more sweetener of choice
turmeric (pumpkin pie spice or cinnamon for garnish)

recipeInstructions.text: Bring water and spices to a boil. Simmer for a minute.
recipeInstructions.name: Bring water and spices to a boil. Simmer for a minute.

recipeInstructions.text: Blend or froth the non dairy milk and sweetener until frothy. Add to the boiling water.
recipeInstructions.name: Blend or froth the non dairy milk and sweetener until frothy. Add to the boiling water.

recipeInstructions.text: Bring to just about a boil.
recipeInstructions.name: Bring to just about a boil.

recipeInstructions.text: Pour into mugs. Sprinkle pinches of turmeric and pumpkin pie spice and serve! You can also add a dollop of whipped non dairy cream on top to serve.
